Name: Olusheno
description:
Olusheno, a local social enterprise based in Namibia, has provided sustainable solar lighting to over 13,000 households to date across the country through its partnership with d.light design, a leading manufacturer of solar lighting systems. 

This month, Olusheno fully repaid their first Kiva loan in full ahead of schedule. They would now like to fundraise a second, larger loan through Kiva to provide energy access to an additional 3,000 vulnerable households during this uncertain time.

Olusheno is working to fulfill the governmentâ€™s dream of bringing reliable electricity to its one million off-grid citizens by 2030.
